site_name: Plot H11A Within Land Bound By New Kent Road To The North Rodney Place To The EastPlot H11B And Elephant Park To The South And Plot H5 To The West
description: Non-material amendment of permission ref. 19/AP/2116 (Approval of reserved matters (appearance, layout and scale only) for Plot H11A within Elephant Park submitted pursuant to the outline planning permission ref. 12/AP/1092. The proposal comprises the construction of three buildings ranging between 10 and 19 storeys in height (maximum height 66.8m AOD) comprising 222 residential units 1,421.8sqm (GEA) flexible retail, office, community and leisure (A1-A5/B1/D1/D2) uses, wheelchair accessible parking, cycle storage, servicing, plant areas, landscaping, new public realm, and other associated works with a revised facade design, a revised ground floor layout, revised floorspace figures and a reduction in maximum height to those approved by reserved matters approval ref. 18/AP/1862 for Plot 11a) in order to amend the description of development to reflect the revised areas of retail and office floorspace, and make changes to the ground floor layout and to read as follows:"Application for approval of reserved matters (appearance, layout and scale only) for Plot H11A within Elephant Park submitted pursuant to the Outline Planning Permission ref. 12/AP/1092. The proposal comprises the construction of three buildings ranging between 10 and 19 storeys in height (maximum height 66.8m AOD) comprising 222 residential units, 1,211 sqm (GEA) flexible retail, office, community and leisure (A1-A5/B1/D1/D2) uses, wheelchair accessible parking, cycle storage, servicing, plant areas, landscaping, new public realm, and other associated works, with a revised facade design, a revised ground floor layout, revised floorspace figures and a reduction in maximum height to those approved by reserved matters approval ref. 18/AP/1862 for Plot H11a."
